These divide three group : - Group I : include 50 woman preterm premature rupture membrane ( PPROM , n=50 ) gestational age 24 34 week . - Group II : include 25 term non-labor control ( T-CTR , n=25 ) gestational age 37 41 week . - Group III : include 25 preterm non-labor control ( P-CTR , n=25 ) gestational age 24 34 weeks.Full History taking , include personal history maternal age , obstetric history number previous pregnancy , history previous PPROM .
